timeline.bodyText: Add this to the abstract *WithHooks step
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText:
I do not get why we need this.
If we need the blue_green phase, why not directly put it here - SubprocessPhase -> BlueGreenPhase
and the corresponding phases will be IDLE/LIVE
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

replies.bodyText: Or can we use only the Phase.AFTER_RESUME in order to determine whether we are in IDLE or LIVE phases?
replies.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.author: enchobelezirev

timeline.bodyText: why is this saved in the executedHooks but not used for anything?
timeline.author: ikasarov

timeline.bodyText: wouldn't it make a bit more sense to have this code in the enum for the HookPhase itself?
timeline.author: ikasarov

replies.bodyText: for example: HOOKS_DELIMITER is something already used in the enum, as well as the enum has a method to get a value from 1 string, why not add a method to get a value from all the needed strings (deploymentType, phase, phaseLocator)
replies.author: ikasarov
